Text:
Let us pray.
Fill us with your peace, Lord. Cover our bodies with Your peace while we sleep. [t] The seeds sown for Your Kingdom, by our labor, we now trust to Your hands. [*] Tend and nurture them. Care for them now until they are ready. Bring them from the seed of your Word to their eternal harvest, through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
